title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description:
Gather and document the following requirements for the AIComposer system:
1. Desired features (real-time composition, multiple music genres support, adaptive music, etc.) 
2. Supported music genres (pop, classical, jazz, electronic) 
3. Target platforms (Web, iOS, Android) 
4. Performance expectations (processing speed, memory usage, latency constraints if any) 
5. Integration with external music libraries or APIs (SoundCloud, Spotify API, MIDI files support) 
6. User interface requirements (customizable interfaces, intuitive controls, real-time feedback, accessible design considerations such as screen reader compatibility and keyboard navigation) 
7. Data privacy and security considerations (data anonymization, encryption, user consent management) 
8. Scalability and sustainability requirements 
9. API documentation standards and guidelines (if applicable) 
10. Any other relevant constraints or considerations. This includes, but is not limited to, accessibility, user experience, and the impact of AI on musical creativity.
For the initial stage, focus on defining high-level requirements.
Once completed, update the rfc_state to 'READY_FOR_REVIEW'. Assign this task to the task-decomposer.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall architecture of the AIComposer system, including components for music generation, user interface, and data management.

title: Develop Music Generation Model
description: Research and develop the AI model responsible for generating original music compositions based on various styles and genres.

title: Implement User Interface
description: Design and develop the user interface for the AIComposer system, allowing users to interact with the music generation model and configure settings.

title: Set up Data Management
description: Implement a data management system to store and retrieve generated music compositions, user preferences, and other relevant data.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Ensure the AIComposer system adheres to security best practices, including data encryption, user authentication, and access controls.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a CI/CD pipeline for automated testing, building, and deploying the AIComposer system to various environments.

title: Write Documentation
description: Prepare comprehensive documentation for the AIComposer system, including user guides, developer documentation, and maintenance manuals.

title: Conduct Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Plan and execute thorough testing of the AIComposer system, including unit tests, integration tests, and user acceptance testing.
dependencies: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
